name: King of Knights, Alfred
effect:
[ACT](VC)[1/turn]:[COST][Counter-Blast 1], search your deck for up to one "Blaster Blade", call it to (RC), and that unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn. Shuffle your deck.
[CONT](VC):During your turn, if you have a "Blaster Blade" on your (RC), this unit gets [Power] +10000.

name: Imperial Daughter
effect:
[AUTO](VC):When placed, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], look at two cards from the top of your deck, put one card from among them into your hand, put one card from among them into your soul or on the top of your deck, and if you rode from a grade 3, this unit gets [Power] +15000/[Critical] +1 until end of turn.
[ACT](VC)[1/turn]:[COST][Soul-Blast 1], and one of your units get [Power] +6000 until end of turn.

name: Dragonic Waterfall
effect:
[AUTO](VC):When placed, choose one of your opponent's grade 2 or greater rear-guards, and retire it.
[AUTO](VC):When it attacks, [COST][Soul-Blast 1] grade 3], and until end of that battle, this unit gets [Power] +10000/[Critical] +1, and your opponent cannot call sentinels to (GC) from hand.

name: Perfect Raizer
effect:
[AUTO](VC):When it attacks, [COST][Counter-Blast 2], and [Stand] two of your rear-guards in the front row.
[AUTO](VC):When its attack hits, if you have a card with "Raizer" in its card name in your soul, [Counter-Charge 1], and one of your units get [Power] +5000 until end of turn.

name: Soul Saver Dragon
effect:
[ACT](VC):[COST][Soul-Blast 5], and six of your units get [Power] +15000 until end of turn.
[AUTO](VC):When it attacks, you may [Soul-Charge 1].

name: High Dog Breeder, Akane
effect:
[AUTO](VC/RC):When placed, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], search your deck for up to one "Pongal", call it to (RC), and shuffle your deck.
[CONT](VC/RC):During the battle that it was boosted by a <High Beast>, this unit gets [Power] +3000.

name: CEO Amaterasu
effect:
[ACT](VC)[1/turn]:[COST][Counter-Blast 1], draw a card, look at the top card of your deck, and put it on the top or bottom of your deck.
[AUTO](VC/RC):When you look at your deck due to effects during your turn, this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn. (Activates for "look", "reveal", and "search" effects. +5000 each time you look regardless of number of cards)

name: Silent Tom
effect:
[AUTO](VC/RC):When placed, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], and this unit gets [Power] +6000 until end of turn.
[CONT](VC/RC):During the battle that it attacked a vanguard, your opponent cannot call normal units to (GC) from hand.

name: Circle Magus
effect:
[AUTO](VC/RC):When your drive check reveals a grade 2 or greater card, you may put that card on the bottom of your deck. If you do, draw a card.
[AUTO]:When rode upon, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], and draw a card.

name: Berserk Dragon
effect:
[AUTO](VC/RC):When placed, [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & Soul-Blast 1], choose one of your opponent's rear-guards, retire it, and if this unit is on your (VC), draw a card.
[AUTO](RC):When it attacks a vanguard, if you have more rear-guards than your opponent, this unit gets [Power] +3000 until end of that battle.

name: Flame of Hope, Aermo
effect:
[CONT](RC):During the battle that it boosted, this unit gets [Power] +3000.
[AUTO](RC):When your opponent's rear-guard is retired during your turn, [COST][retire this unit], draw a card, and [Counter-Charge 1].

name: Asura Kaiser
effect: [AUTO](VC):When your drive check reveals a grade 2 or greater card, [Stand] one of your rear-guards, and if the revealed card is grade 3 or greater, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], and that rear-guard gets [Power] +10000 until end of turn.

name: Conjurer of Mithril
effect: [AUTO](RC):When placed from your hand, [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & Soul-Blast 1], search your deck for up to one grade 2 card, call it to (RC), and shuffle your deck.

name: Little Sage, Marron
effect: [AUTO](RC)[1/turn]:When your other rear-guard is placed in the same column as this unit, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], draw a card, and this unit gets [Power] +3000 until end of turn.

name: Flash Shield, Iseult
effect:
[CONT]:Sentinel (You may only have up to four cards with "[CONT]:Sentinel" in a deck.)
[AUTO](GC):When placed, [COST][discard a card from your hand], and one of your units cannot be hit until end of that battle.

name: Victorious Deer
effect: [ACT](VC/RC)[1/turn]:[COST][Soul-Blast 2] grade 3 & discard a card from your hand], look at seven cards from the top of your deck, reveal up to two [Critical] triggers from among them, put the revealed cards on the top of your deck in any order, shuffle the rest of the cards looked at, put them on the bottom of your deck, and six of your units get [Power] +10000 until end of turn.

name: Promise Daughter
effect:
[CONT](VC/RC):During the battle that it attacked a vanguard, if the number of cards in your hand is four or more, this unit gets [Power] +6000.
[CONT](RC)/(GC):This unit cannot be retired due to your opponent's card effects. (It can be chosen)

name: Weather Forecaster, Miss Mist
effect:
[CONT]:Sentinel (You may only have up to four cards with "[CONT]:Sentinel" in a deck.)
[AUTO](GC):When placed, [COST][discard a card from your hand], and one of your units cannot be hit until end of that battle.

name: Cruel Dragon
effect:
[CONT](Hand):During your turn which your opponent's rear-guard was retired, this card can be normal called to your (RC) even if your vanguard is grade 2 or less.
[AUTO](RC):When its attack hits a vanguard, [COST][return this unit to your hand], and [Soul-Charge 1].

name: Dragonic Gaias
effect: [AUTO](RC):When it boosts a grade 3 or greater unit, [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & put this unit into your soul], and the boosted unit gets [Critical] +1 until end of that battle. (The boosted [Power] ceases if it is put into your soul)

effect:

[AUTO](GC):When placed, [COST][discard a card from your hand], and one of your units cannot be hit until end of that battle.

name: Raizer Custom
effect:

[AUTO](RC)[1/turn]:When your other rear-guard in the same column as this unit [Stand], you may [Stand] this unit.

name: Twin Blader
effect:

name: Pongal
effect: [AUTO](RC):When placed, if you have another unit in the same column as this unit, [Soul-Charge 1]. If the card [Soul-Charge] is a trigger unit, this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.
